summary: WHEN MY HUSBAND WAS PUTTING OUR DAUGHTER IN HER CAR SEAT, THE "SPRING" BETWEEN THE "ARM" THAT LIFTS OVER HER HEAD AND THE SEAT ITSELF BROKE. IT WAS PULLED COMPLETELY AWAY FROM THE SEAT WITHOUT ANY FORCE AT ALL. VERY DANGEROUS. SEAT IS COMPLETELY USELESS. WE GOT A NEW ONE RIGHT AWAY, BUT WANT A FULL REFUND FOR THE BROKEN SEAT. I'VE CONTACTED COSCO, BUT HAVE NOT RECEIVED A RESPONSE YET.    *NLM
